mapper.select: select ENAME , SAL from emp where (DEPTNO = 10 or DEPTNO = 30) and SAL >= #{sal}
select ENAME , MGR from emp where MGR is null
select ENAME , JOB , HIREDATE , SAL from emp where date_format(HIREDATE ,'%Y') = #{year}
select ENAME , SAL from emp where date_format(HIREDATE ,'%m') = #{month}
select ENAME , HIREDATE , SAL from emp where JOB = #{job} order by HIREDATE asc limit 1
select * from emp as e inner join dept as d on e.DEPTNO = d.DEPTNO where e.EMPNO = #{empno}
